title: Broadstripe Selects NuTEQs GOCare Mobile Customer Care Solution
text:
NuTEQ Solutions, LLC, a leading provider of software solutions to the telecom and broadband industries, today announced that its GOCare Mobile Customer Care solution has been selected by Broadstripe to proactively deliver customer account data to subscribers’ mobile phones in response to consumer interest in personalized mobile customer care options.
Alpharetta, GA (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
NuTEQ’s GOCare Mobile Customer Care solution utilizes the proven technology of SMS to automate routine customer communications with a service provider’s back office systems. Recognized by Multichannel News’ 2014 Innovator Awards and a 2015 Cable Spotlight Product of the Year Award from Cable.TMCnet.com, GOCare provides two-way communications and multi-step processes to allow customer inquiries, account changes, mobile payments, outage notifications, scheduling changes, and customer satisfaction surveys to be delivered to the customers’ mobile device.
“Broadstripe GOCare is the next step in our effort to improve the customer experience at Broadstripe,” said Rick Oldenburg, System Manager of Broadstripe. “Customers are increasingly relying on text messaging for communications. GOCare allows customers to send and receive text messages with Broadstripe for important account information like monthly statements, account balances and due dates, appointment reminders, and payment verifications. The service is free from Broadstripe effective October 1, 2015.” concluded Oldenburg.
“We are excited that Broadstripe has entrusted NuTEQ with a critical element of their customer experience,” stated John Brooks, Chief Executive Officer of NuTEQ Solutions. “GOCare is a game-changer for competitive service providers who put the customer first and recognize the need to communicate with customers in a manner determined by the customer. We look forward to working with the Broadstripe team to ensure the successful implementation and operation of GOCare,” concluded Brooks.
# # #
About NuTEQ Solutions
NuTEQ Solutions provides software solutions to the broadband, telecom, and utility service provider industries. Our portfolio of software solutions deliver new revenues, reduce operating costs, and improve customer satisfaction. NuTEQ’s GOCare has been recognized by Multichannel News’ 2014 Innovator Awards and 2015 Cable Spotlight Product of the Year Award from TMC.net. NuTEQ was founded in 2013 by industry veterans John Brooks, Mike Roddy, and Rick Perkins and has offices in St. Louis and Atlanta.
About Broadstripe, an Anne Arundel Broadband Company
Broadstripe, an Anne Arundel Broadband Company, is dedicated to providing residential and business customers with superior entertainment and communication products with outstanding customer service.
